item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 13, 20:00 UTC  -  Dec 14, 00:00 UTC

Dec 9, 15:38 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/12/2022 10:00 UTC
End time : 14/12/2022 00:00 UTC
Service impact : A short downtime will be experienced. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing an internal maintenance in order to release the latest features, bug fixes and performance updates.

item.title: [FR][InternetAccess] - xDSL perturbation
item.description:
Dec 8, 15:46 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 08/12/2022 12:10 UTC
End Time : 08/12/2022 13:15 UTC
Current status : Resolved

Dec 8, 13:32 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 08/12/2022 12:10 UTC
Service impact : Customers might experience perturbation in their xDSL traffic
Ongoing actions : Investigating
A national (France) saturation has been detected. We don't see any perturbation so we are monitoring the situation.
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [Global][Domains] - .uk/.co.uk
item.description:
Dec 7, 09:00 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 06/12/2022 10:30 UTC
End Time : 07/12/2022 08:56 UTC
Root cause : An internal maintenance on domains caused the incident.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are operational.

Dec 6, 19:02 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Our teams are still working on the incident. We estimate that the situation will get back to normal the 07/12/2022 09:00 UTC.

Dec 6, 13:27 UTC
Identified - Start Time : 06/12/2022 10:30 UTC
Service impact : Customers with .uk/.co.uk domains are receiving an e-mail regarding unlocking of their domain name without any action on their side. It is a generic e-mail and it won’t affect their service in any possible way.
Root cause : An internal maintenance on domains caused the incident.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem. We have an ETA for 06/12/2022 20:00 UTC

item.description:
Nov 30, 00:09 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 29/11/2022 23:45 UTC
End time : 30/11/2022 00:05 UTC
Service impacted : Websites were unreachable on following filerz :
Filerz74 cluster020
Filerz70 cluster020
Filerz71 cluster020
Filerz201 cluster026
Filerz43 cluster021
filerz77 cluster23
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : GRA
Root cause : Incident due to instability on upstream network equipment.

All impacted services are now operational.

item.title: [GRA1][Webhosting] - Owstats
item.description:
Nov 29, 18:10 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 29, 16:18 UTC
Update - The maintenance will take longer than scheduled.
Service impact : The generation of today's ownstats statistics has been stop.
We are sorry for the inconvenience.

Nov 29, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 24, 21:47 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 29/11/2022 08:00 UTC 
End time : 29/11/2022 17:00 UTC 
Service impact : Only stats (Owstats) accesses are impacted, no impact to report on customer service.
Service improvement : We need to perform an maintenance on our storage servers for Web statistics, we need to stop the access of OWstats during a day for domain starting with a,c,d,e,g,i,n,o,r,v,w,x,y,z on cluster010.
